trans-unit.source: Represents a persistence service that uses a SQL database to store workflow state information.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en beständig tjänst som använder en SQL-databas för att lagra information om arbetsflödets tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SqlWorkflowPersistenceService class represents a fully-functional persistence service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Klassen SqlWorkflowPersistenceService representerar en fullt fungerande beständig tjänst.

trans-unit.source: You can use this service out-of-box to persist and retrieve workflow state information about a workflow instance when requested to by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda den här tjänsten out-of-box för att spara och hämta arbetsflödet statusinformation om en arbetsflödesinstans när begär workflow runtime engine.

trans-unit.source: The SqlWorkflowPersistenceService participates in the workflow transaction batching functionality provided by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>.
trans-unit.target: SqlWorkflowPersistenceService deltar i arbetsflödet transaktion batching funktionerna i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: That is, it adds objects that represent pending writes to the SQL database to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> and implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface.
trans-unit.target: Det vill säga den lägger till objekt som representerar väntande skriver till SQL-databasen till den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>och implementerar den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>gränssnitt.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SqlWorkflowPersistenceService supports locking of workflow instances.
trans-unit.target: SqlWorkflowPersistenceService stöder låsning av arbetsflödesinstanser.

trans-unit.source: This feature is used when several workflow runtimes share the same database.
trans-unit.target: Den här funktionen används när flera arbetsflödet körningar delar samma databas.

trans-unit.source: A column in the SQL database table is used to mark a workflow instance as locked whenever it is being used by a workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: En kolumn i SQL-databastabell används för att markera en arbetsflödesinstans som låst när den används av ett arbetsflöde för körning.

trans-unit.source: The SqlWorkflowPersistenceService does not load a workflow instance that is marked as "in use" by another runtime.
trans-unit.target: SqlWorkflowPersistenceService läses inte in en arbetsflödesinstans som har markerats som "Använd" av en annan runtime.

trans-unit.source: Typically these locks are released when the workflow instance is persisted, for example, on idle, completion, or termination.
trans-unit.target: Vanligtvis dessa låsen släpps om arbetsflödesinstansen sparas, till exempel inaktiv slutförts eller avslutning.

trans-unit.source: The locks can also be released automatically after a period of inactivity.
trans-unit.target: Lås kan också frigöras automatiskt efter en tids inaktivitet.

trans-unit.source: This period of inactivity can be set using the constructor of the SqlWorkflowPersistenceService class.
trans-unit.target: Denna period av inaktivitet kan anges med konstruktorn för SqlWorkflowPersistenceService-klassen.

trans-unit.source: It can also be set through the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Det kan också ställas in via konfigurationsfilen.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] persistence services in general, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]beständiga tjänster finns i allmänhet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klass.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: Workflow instances can contain timers, for example, if they have a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Arbetsflödesinstanser kan innehålla timers, till exempel om de har en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>

trans-unit.source: For workflows that contain timers, the SqlWorkflowPersistenceService records the time when the workflow's next timer expires.
trans-unit.target: För arbetsflöden som innehåller timers registrerar SqlWorkflowPersistenceService när arbetsflödets nästa timer upphör att gälla.

trans-unit.source: The SqlWorkflowPersistenceService periodically polls the database, looking for workflows whose timers have expired.
trans-unit.target: SqlWorkflowPersistenceService avsöker med jämna mellanrum databasen, söker efter arbetsflöden vars timer har upphört att gälla.

trans-unit.source: The frequency of the polling interval can be set using the SqlWorkflowPersistenceService constructor or using a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Frekvensen för avsökningsintervallet kan anges med hjälp av konstruktorn SqlWorkflowPersistenceService eller en konfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When using both the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> and the SqlWorkflowPersistenceService in a workflow application, it is recommended to use a single database for both persistence and tracking.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > När du använder både den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>och SqlWorkflowPersistenceService i ett arbetsflöde-program, rekommenderas att använda en enskild databas för både beständiga och spårning.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"></xref> class by using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av de angivna parametrarna.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn anropas när workflow runtime engine läser in tjänster från en programkonfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: It can also be programmatically invoked with the `NameValueCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Det kan också programmässigt anropas med de `NameValueCollection` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The valid parameters are `ConnectionString`, `OwnershipTimeoutSeconds`, `UnloadOnIdle`, and `EnableRetries`.
trans-unit.target: Parametrar som är giltiga `ConnectionString`, `OwnershipTimeoutSeconds`, `UnloadOnIdle`, och `EnableRetries`.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown if parameters contain any other keys.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ArgumentException>genereras om parametrar innehålla andra nycklar.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains startup parameters.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> som innehåller Startparametrar.

trans-unit.source: parameters contains an invalid database connection string.
trans-unit.target: parametersinnehåller en ogiltig databasanslutningssträng.

trans-unit.source: parameters is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: parameters är en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"></xref> class by using the database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av anslutningssträngen för databasen.

trans-unit.source: A valid database connection string.
trans-unit.target: En ogiltig databasanslutningssträng.

trans-unit.source: connectionString is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: connectionStringär en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"></xref> class using a database connection string and other parameters.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av en databasanslutningssträng och andra parametrar.

trans-unit.source: Note that using this constructor (which provides a value for `instanceOwnershipDuration`) enables locking.
trans-unit.target: Observera att med hjälp av den här konstruktorn (som innehåller ett värde för `instanceOwnershipDuration`) gör det möjligt att låsa.

trans-unit.source: To create a persistence service that does not enable locking, use a different constructor that does not specify `instanceOwnershipDuration`.
trans-unit.target: Använd en annan konstruktor som inte anger för att skapa en beständig tjänst som inte aktiverar låsa `instanceOwnershipDuration`.

trans-unit.source: A valid database connection string.
trans-unit.target: En ogiltig databasanslutningssträng.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to unload the workflow when it is in an idle state.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>ta bort arbetsflödet när den är i viloläge.

trans-unit.source: The length of time that locks are maintained on idle workflows.
trans-unit.target: Hur lång tid som underhålls lås på inaktiv arbetsflöden.

trans-unit.source: The frequency at which the persistence service polls the database for workflows with expired timers.
trans-unit.target: Frekvensen som avsöker beständiga tjänsten databasen för arbetsflöden med timer har upphört att gälla.

trans-unit.source: connectionString is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: connectionStringär en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"></xref> retries committing a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"> </xref> återförsök genomför en arbetsbatch.

trans-unit.source: The following work items cannot be batched and any transaction retries must be handled through the `EnableRetries` property: - Polling for expired database timers.
trans-unit.target: Följande arbetsobjekt kan inte grupperas och eventuella omförsök för transaktion måste hanteras via den `EnableRetries` egenskapen:-avsökning för utgångna databasen timers.

trans-unit.source: - Loading workflow instance states.
trans-unit.target: -Instans statusar lästes in.

trans-unit.source: - Reloading workflow instances when the workflow run-time engine starts.
trans-unit.target: -Ladda arbetsflödesinstanser när körning arbetsflödesmotorn startar.

trans-unit.source: - Calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.GetAllWorkflows%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Anropar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.GetAllWorkflows%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.GetAllWorkflows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Förutom anges programmässigt, kan den här funktionen aktiveras via en konfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]hur du ställer in den här egenskapen via en konfigurationsfil finns [arbetsflöde konfigurationsfiler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).

trans-unit.source: For general information about retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: Allmän information om du försöker arbete Batchtransaktioner finns [batchbearbetning statusinformation i arbetsflöden](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om tjänsten bör försöka genomför arbetsbatch; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves instance descriptions of all persisted workflows.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar instans beskrivningar av alla beständiga arbetsflöden.

trans-unit.source: A list of all persisted workflows.
trans-unit.target: En lista över alla beständiga arbetsflöden.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified completed scope from the database.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar slutförda definitionsområdet från databasen.

trans-unit.source: The workflow run-time engine uses LoadCompletedContextActivity during compensation.
trans-unit.target: Körning arbetsflödesmotorn använder LoadCompletedContextActivity under ersättning.

trans-unit.source: LoadCompletedContextActivity should only be called by the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: LoadCompletedContextActivity bör endast anropas av körningen arbetsflödesmotorn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the scope activity.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>för aktiviteten omfång.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that encloses the scope activity.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som omsluter aktiviteten omfång.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the completed scope.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerar färdigt område.

trans-unit.source: A scope that matches id could not be found in the database.
trans-unit.target: En omfattning som matchar id kunde inte hittas i databasen.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a list of ids for workflows with expired timers.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en lista över ID: n för arbetsflöden med timer har upphört att gälla.

trans-unit.source: A list of ids for workflows with expired timers.
trans-unit.target: En lista över ID: n för arbetsflöden med timer har upphört att gälla.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the loading interval.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar Inläsningsintervallet längd.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 2 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 2 minuter.

trans-unit.source: The frequency at which the persistence service polls the database for workflows with expired timers.
trans-unit.target: Frekvensen som avsöker beständiga tjänsten databasen för arbetsflöden med timer har upphört att gälla.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified workflow instance state from the database.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar angivet arbetsflöde instansens tillstånd från databasen.

trans-unit.source: LoadWorkflowInstanceState should only be called by the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: LoadWorkflowInstanceState bör endast anropas av körningen arbetsflödesmotorn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>av instanstillstånd arbetsflöde.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerar rotaktiviteten av arbetsflödesinstansen.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance state that matches id could not be found in the database.
trans-unit.target: Ett arbetsflöde instanstillstånd som matchar id kunde inte hittas i databasen.

trans-unit.source: Starts a new timer and recovers running workflow instances.
trans-unit.target: Startar en ny timer och återställer körs arbetsflödesinstanser.

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the specified completed scope.
trans-unit.target: Sparar tillståndet för det angivna färdigt området.

trans-unit.source: `completedScopeActivity` is serialized and added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `completedScopeActivity`är serialiseras och lagts till i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the completed scope.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerar färdigt område.

trans-unit.source: Saves the specified workflow instance state.
trans-unit.target: Sparar instanstillstånd angivet arbetsflöde.

trans-unit.source: `rootActivity` is serialized and written to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `rootActivity`är serialiseras och skrivs till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: The out-of-box <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> implements locking of the workflow instance state.
trans-unit.target: Out-of-box <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>implementerar låsning av arbetsflödet instansen tillstånd.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: The user must configure the `instanceOwnershipDuration` parameter in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Användaren måste konfigurera den `instanceOwnershipDuration` parametern i konstruktorn.

trans-unit.source: This value decides the time interval during which the instance can be locked by a host.
trans-unit.target: Det här värdet avgör det tidsintervall under vilken instansen kan vara låst av en värd.

trans-unit.source: If multiple hosts share the same persistence service and database, and another host tries to load the instance during this interval, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException> occurs.
trans-unit.target: Om flera värdar delar samma beständig tjänst och databasen och en annan värd försöker läsa in instansen under intervall, en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>inträffar.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>klass.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: The root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Rotaktiviteten av arbetsflödesinstansen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow instance should not be locked; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the workflow instance should be locked.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om arbetsflödesinstansen inte bör låsas. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> om arbetsflödesinstansen som ska låsas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service instance identifier.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar identifierare för service-instans.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `Guid.Empty`.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är `Guid.Empty`.

trans-unit.source: The service instance identifier.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare för service-instans.

trans-unit.source: Starts the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Startar den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Start must only be called by the workflow run-time engine.
trans-unit.target: Starta måste bara anropas av körningen arbetsflödesmotorn.

trans-unit.source: Stops the service and the timer.
trans-unit.target: Stoppar tjänsten och -timern.

trans-unit.source: Writes an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of serialized state objects to the database.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>serialiserade tillstånd objekt i databasen.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The serialized state objects that are contained in `items` are written to the database.
trans-unit.target: De serialiserade tillstånd-objekt som finns i `items` skrivs till databasen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of work items to be written to the database.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>arbetsobjekt som ska skrivas till databasen.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to write to the database.
trans-unit.target: Ett fel uppstod vid försök att skriva till databasen.

trans-unit.source: Completes the work batch and releases any resources.
trans-unit.target: Slutför arbetsbatch och släpper alla resurser.

trans-unit.source: In the out-of-box implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.Complete%2A> is a no-op.
trans-unit.target: I out-of-box-implementeringen av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.Complete%2A>är en Nej op.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.Complete%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from and extend the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> class, you may use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.Complete%2A> to perform any actions required on `items` dictated by your implementation.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ärva från och utöka de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>klassen, som du kan använda <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.Complete%2A>att utföra alla åtgärder som krävs på `items` enligt din implementering.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.Complete%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the commit succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om bekräftelsen lyckades Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of serialized state objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>serialiserade tillstånd objekt.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the collection of serialized state objects should be written to the database.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om objektsamlingen serialiserade tillstånd ska skrivas till databasen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.MustCommit%2A> always returns `true`, which instructs the workflow run-time engine to invoke <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.Commit%2A> on the batch.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.MustCommit%2A>returnerar alltid `true`, vilket instruerar körning arbetsflödesmotorn att anropa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.Commit%2A>på batchen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.Commit%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.MustCommit%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of serialized state objects to be written to the database.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>serialiserade tillstånd objekt som ska skrivas till databasen.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> indicates that the batch should be committed; <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.MustCommit*> always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Anger att gruppen ska vara allokerat; <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.MustCommit*>returnerar alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService.System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork.MustCommit*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the workflow is unloaded when it is in an idle state.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om arbetsflödet tas bort när den är i viloläge.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerar rotaktiviteten av arbetsflödesinstansen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow is unloaded when it is in an idle state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om arbetsflödet tas bort när den är i viloläge; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unlocks access to the specified workflow instance state.
trans-unit.target: Låser upp åtkomst till angivet arbetsflöde instansens tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the workflow runtime to unlock a workflow instance state in the data store without persistence and is called by the workflow runtime if the runtime must unlock the state without persisting, for example, in the case of an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden används av arbetsflödets körtid för att låsa upp ett arbetsflöde instanstillstånd i datalagret utan beständiga och anropas av arbetsflödets körtid om körningen måste låsa upp tillståndet utan beständighet, till exempel när det gäller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Abort%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerar rotaktiviteten av arbetsflödesinstansen.
